name: Guzzlord
description: It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. It's one of the Ultra Beasts.

abilities.name: Beast Boost
abilities.effect: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.
abilities.description: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.
